title: Interpretation of seeing prayer in a dream in detail

preview.html: Seeing prayer in a dream for a married woman symbolizes goodness and justice in religion and in the world, and seeing prayer facing the Qiblah in a dream for a married woman indicates her integrity and guidance to the truth. Sins and transgressions, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about praying in a dream. Ibn Sirin says: “Seeing prayer in a dream indicates the fulfillment of obligations and the fulfillment of promises. Obligatory prayer in a dream: good news of fulfillment of trustworthiness and fulfillment of debts. As for the Sunnah prayer in a dream, it indicates patience in the face of hardships and adversity, and a dream of losing Praying indicates difficulty and turmoil in matters. In business. Al-Nabulsi said: Prayer in a dream indicates goodness and blessing in religion and in the world. Praying to the Holy Kaaba in a dream shows integrity in religion and in the world, and performing prayer at the appropriate time in a dream indicates performing what God Almighty has commanded and its rules. Ibn Shaheen says that prayer in a dream indicates... The dreamer is a person of religion and justice. The desert is a sign of travel or pilgrimage. Seeing prayer in a mosque in a dream means safety, justice, and mercy. Interpretation of seeing prayer in a dream. Interpretation of seeing prayer in a dream for a married woman according to Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interprets seeing prayer in a dream for a married woman as good in religion and in the world. And if a married woman sees that she is praying and completes her prayer in... In a dream, this indicates paying off her debt and expanding her livelihood. Seeing the Istighfar prayer in a dream for a married woman indicates her repentance from a sin she committed, and Tarawih prayer in a dream shows her great responsibilities and boring work. Fajr prayer in a dream for a married woman indicates an increase in good deeds, and if a married woman sees that she She prays the noon prayer in a dream, as this indicates her good obedience and loyalty to religion and the dream of the afternoon. Prayer for a married woman indicates intercession for her living conditions, and seeing the Maghrib prayer in a dream for a married woman indicates the end of anguish and sadness in her life, and a dream about the evening prayer for a woman indicates its fulfillment. Her responsibilities to the fullest. If a married woman sees in a dream that she is begging after praying, this means that her needs will be met and her desires will be fulfilled. As for the dream of not completing the prayer for a married woman, it indicates her heart’s clinging to worldly matters and ignoring religion, and God knows best. The kiss of prayer in a dream for a married woman, says Al-Nabulsi. : “The qibla of prayer in a married woman’s dream symbolizes the path of truth and the right approach.” Correcting the direction of the qibla in a woman’s dream is evidence of her avoiding false work and deception, and if a married woman sees in a dream someone correcting the direction of the qibla for her, this means that she heard useful advice and guidance. Whoever alerts others to the direction of the Qiblah in a dream, he enjoins good and forbids evil. Knowing the direction of the Qiblah in a married woman’s dream indicates that she has abandoned sins and taken the correct approach in her life. If a married woman sees the Qiblah behind her back in a dream, this means that she is committing sins. And she abandons religion. Praying for the Qiblah in a dream for a married woman indicates integrity in

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about someone who blessed me with a son according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a person who gave me a child is one of the things that bring comfort and reassurance to the soul, because children are the jewel of the life of this world, and seeing them in reality makes you feel joy and pleasure, and seeing them in a dream makes a person resort to interpreting the dream and in conclusion its connotations and signs. Interpretation of a dream about a person who gave me a child If a person sees that someone else gives him a small child in a dream, the vision indicates that the dreamer will obtain very good and abundant sustenance in the near future and may also indicate that the dreamer will obtain a very large sum of money without effort or fatigue that comes to him primarily through a gift or inheritance. The dreamer taking a small child or during the breastfeeding period indicates a change in the dreamer's condition from sadness to pleasure or from poverty to wealth, especially if the child has a beautiful appearance and a beautiful body. A person who can bear responsibility. Interpretation of a dream about someone who gave me a child by Ibn Sirin According to Ibn Kathir's interpretation, the interpretation of a dream about someone who gave me a child indicates good luck and abundant kindness for the dreamer, and it also indicates that the dreamer is kind-hearted, kind-hearted, and has a beautiful soul who does not carry an ounce of hatred for others. If someone sees that someone else gives him a child while he is asleep, and that child is beautiful, then the vision shows good news and happy tidings, a little. Interpretation of a dream about someone who gave me a single child If an unmarried woman sees a child in her arms in a dream, this is a sign that she will get something she has long desired, but she will have to do everything in her power to achieve it. When an unmarried woman sees that someone gives her a child in her dream and she already knows about this child, this is a sign that what she is looking for will be fruitful very soon, while if she does not know this child, this means an indication of abundant sustenance or good news that she did not expect before or lost hope of getting it, it may indicate that a person of status and money will propose to her and they will have a strong and happy personality. The relationship, God willing. Interpretation of a dream of a person who gave me a child for a married woman Seeing a married woman giving birth to a child in a dream indicates good things to come. Interpretation scholars confirm that a married woman seeing a laughing child indicates the abundance of sustenance and peace of mind that she enjoys in her life and that her life is largely stable with her husband. He is a spendthrift who abuses what he has, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of a person who gave me a child for a pregnant woman indicates that the viewer A pregnant woman gives her a child in a dream that she will soon hear good news. One of the problems that will greatly affect her psyche, so she must turn to God Almighty and ask Him for care and attention. If a pregnant woman sees that someone is giving her a child and this child is beautiful and calm, or looks at her with tender eyes and faint smiles, then the vision portends the stability that she will enjoy in her life and will be satisfied with everything that happens in the coming period. Interpretation of a dream of a person who gave me a child The interpretation of a dream of a person who gave me a child for a divorced woman shows a lot of good, especially if it was

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about eggs according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about eggs: Does seeing eggs bode well or ill? What are the negative meanings of dreaming about eggs? What do rotten eggs indicate in a dream? Read this article and learn about the interpretation of the white vision of an unmarried woman, a married woman, a pregnant woman, and a man, according to Ibn Sirin and interpretive scholars. Interpretation of a dream about eggs: Eggs in a dream indicate happiness, joys, and the dreamer’s passage through some unexpected events in the coming period. Easter eggs in a dream are said to indicate positive changes in the dreamer's life soon. Also, seeing fish eggs means earning money, achieving ambitions, and rising in the future. Bird eggs in a dream symbolize that the dreamer will get rid of his laziness, feel energetic and active, and will make efforts to achieve all his goals in the coming period. If the dreamer dreams that he is throwing eggshells in the street, then this It means that he will change his routine soon and do some new things in the near future. Feeling anxious and disturbed. Interpretation of a dream about eggs by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that the white color in the dream symbolizes the dreamer’s approaching marriage to a slender and beautiful girl who will be happy and comfortable with her. If the dreamer gets married and sees his partner coloring eggs in his dream, then he has good news that he will give birth to a beautiful woman in the near future. But if the dreamer eats eggs in a dream and does not like them in reality, this indicates that he will soon hear some unpleasant news related to his family and relatives. Seeing eggs in the refrigerator indicates that the dreamer is hiding some secrets from his family and does not want to share them with anyone. However, if the dreamer sees scorpion eggs in his dream, this means that he will have a naughty child in the future and will suffer from many problems with him. You still cannot find what you are looking for. about him? Log in from Google to the online dream interpretation site and see everything that interests you. Interpretation of a dream about eggs for a single woman. Eggs in an unmarried woman’s dream indicate her ability to make a living and her marriage to the young man she loves in the near future. If the dreamer is robbed soon, she should be careful. If she sees An unmarried woman has a stranger in her dream giving her some eggs, which means that she will get a lot of money in reality, and this indicates the great self-confidence that the dreamer has and the feeling that she is beautiful and wonderful. What is the interpretation of boiled eggs in a dream for a single woman? An unmarried woman who She sees boiled eggs in her dream. This vision indicates that there are many special opportunities in her life and is a confirmation that she will enjoy many happy and joyful moments in her life and that she will be very happy and joyful in the coming days. The girl who sees boiled eggs in her dream interprets this vision for the presence of many Of the special opportunities in her life and nice skin for her, she will marry a special and wealthy person in the coming days who will help her. In life and to confirm that she will live with him many beautiful and special moments for a long period of her life. Many jurists also pointed out that the girl who sees herself in her dream is boiling eggs.

title: Coughing in a dream: Coughing and coughing, dream interpretation for a man, a married woman, and a single woman

preview.html: Dear brothers and sisters, hello and welcome to the Dream Interpretation website. The subject of this article is the interpretation of coughing or coughing in a dream, in which we examine everything that has been said about this phenomenon in a dream, according to a confirmed and reliable Islamic approach, because it is based on the most important sources for expressing visions, which are Ibn Sirin’s book called (Interpretation of Great Dreams) and Al-Nabulsi’s book ( Perfume of dreams in the interpretation of dreams). We wish you an enjoyable and useful continuation of this topic. Coughing or coughing in a dream: Interpretation of Muhammad bin Sirin. Cough is mentioned in the book (Interpretation of Great Dreams) in Chapter 25 devoted to dreams and visions related to diseases, pains and defects that affect the human body or its organs. Sheikh Ibn Shirin says: Whoever sees in a dream that he is coughing, then he is complaining to someone close to the ruler or sultan or related to him. Whoever shaves a hair or a thread and then scattered it and did not cut it, then he will have a major quarrel. Or arguing with the person who is quarreling with them over an issue such as inheritance, position, or money. As for the merchant who sees in his dream that he is coughing, he fears that his work or money will run out. If he dreams that he is choking or choking on his cough, then this is a sign of the injustice of an enemy, opponent, or adversary. Coughing and coughing in a dream: Interpretation of Abdul Ghani Al-Nabulsi. In fact, there is no difference in the interpretation of coughing between Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi. They both went to the same purpose and meaning, and to confirm this, I preferred the combination Between the two interpretations until the fortune teller reaches the final meaning. From a dream. Al-Nabulsi says in his famous book (Animal Smell in the Interpretation of Dreams): Coughing in a dream indicates complaining, so whoever sees that he is coughing, then he is complaining about a person related to the ruler. It was said: A cough indicates that the fortuneteller cares about a person’s complaints and does not complain about him. A cough in an unmarried girl’s dream A girl’s cough in a dream indicates that she complains a lot or that she is dissatisfied with herself about many issues and issues. A girl’s cough may indicate a very unstable psychological state as a result of a loss of emotional or physical balance. A cough or a cough in a dream indicates an unstable social or family situation, and a continuous cough indicates the presence of serious family disputes and disagreements. If an unmarried woman sees that she is coughing in a person’s face Or in front of him, this indicates a dispute or disagreement between them. Interpretation of coughing or coughing in a married woman’s dream: If a married woman sees that she is coughing in her dreams, then upon waking up she will suffer from major psychological problems. If a married woman hears someone she knows coughing loudly or loudly, this is her interpretation that this person is complaining about her or reprimanding her because of her bad behavior. Coughing and coughing in a pregnant woman’s dream is a praiseworthy phenomenon, because they are indications of treatment and the removal of worries and problems, and this interpretation also applies to the patient. A woman who complains of illness, pain, or sickness and sees in her dream that she is coughing loudly, will recover, God willing. Interpretation of seeing a dead person coughing in a dream: Dreams related to the dead have special rulings in interpretation, and the most important of these rulings is that the state of the deceased and his characteristics in the vision express his or her status.

title: Interpretation of seeing a tiger in a dream according to Al-Usaimi and Ibn Sirin

preview.html: A tiger in Al-Osaimi’s dream is one of the visions that indicate great goodness and high status. The tiger’s status is high in his society and among his peers, and at other times it indicates evil and worries, so this dream has many connotations, which is what Imam Al Saud said. Imam Al-Osaimi believes that if a person dreams that a tiger is chasing him, this is evidence that this person will fall into many problems in his life, if he cannot escape from them, but if he succeeds in Escaping, this indicates that he will get rid of these problems. He sees that he is buying a tiger, this indicates that he will have some benefits and good things in his life, and if one sees in his dream that he is killing a tiger, then he will defeat his enemies and defeat them victoriously. It is difficult to choose between them, and riding a tiger in a dream foretells the dreamer’s high status. A tiger in a dream for single Al-Osaimi To dream of a tiger trying to violently approach an unmarried girl is a bad dream that indicates the presence of a friend of the dreamer who is trying to harm or hurt her, or indicates that a young man is proposing to marry this girl. But he leaves her. She is in the end and it hurts her a lot, and if she sees in her dream that she is killing the tiger, this indicates her strength in bearing the responsibilities and challenges that she faces, and if she sees that she is being scratched. A tiger, a dream means that someone is proposing to her and paying her a large dowry, and seeing a tiger attacking an unmarried girl in her sleep indicates the desire of many men to marry her and propose to her. A tiger in a dream for a married woman Al-Osaimi. The Imam interpreted seeing a tiger in a married woman’s dream as a good sign indicating It indicates the stability of the dreamer’s life and the good relationship between her and her husband, and it also indicates the abundance of food and the abundance of food. A warning to her that some problems and disagreements will arise between her and her husband that will affect their relationship and their lives. A tiger in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing tigers in a pregnant woman’s dream is a harbinger of the arrival of a male child. It also means peace of life, calm and stability of the relationship between her and her husband, and that her husband has many feelings. Love and affection. As for the sound of the tiger in a dream, it indicates that the dreamer will bring some bad news soon, which will make her sad and anxious. This news may be about the new baby or her relationship with her husband. The tiger in Al-Usaimi Al-Mutlaq’s dream. This dream indicates the dreamer’s great ability to solve her problems and get rid of them. If one sees a tiger in a dream or sees that he is buying a tiger and raising it, this means that he will reach high positions in his work and a high position in his society. If he sees in his dream that a tiger attacked him and was able to escape from it, this indicates his success in all aspects of life. Escaping from a tiger in a dream by Al-Osaimi. Escaping from a tiger in a dream indicates an imminent danger to the dreamer’s life from problems and troubles in the dreamer’s life. A black tiger in a dream Al-Osaimi Seeing a black panther in a dream means grave injustice against the dreamer, whether by an unjust enemy or by an unjust ruler.

title: Interpretation of a dream about the dead kissing the living

preview.html: We review the dream of the dead kissing the living in a dream in our next article to see the most famous things written in the interpretation of this dream. Interpretation of the dream of the dead kissing the living in a dream for a single woman One of the dreams is that if a single woman sees it in her dream, she will worry about many things and we can review it in the following points: If an unmarried woman sees that there is a dead person kissing her in a dream, this is interpreted as love and tenderness coming to her. It may be the best evidence of her approaching meeting a righteous and righteous young man who will live a happy future with her. Kissing the dead in a dream means that the unmarried woman feels great emotional ecstasy towards her lover. But this love and feelings end with a sad and frightening end for her. If the unmarried woman sees a dead person in her dream, she kisses him, and this dead person is a relative or a parent. This may be a testimony to the best of her parents with her because it witnesses her dreams come true in her life. Dreaming of an unmarried woman dead with a beard and gray hair indicates the good condition of that girl. It also indicates her adherence to the principles, traditions and customs in which she grew up and was raised. What if the bachelor sees A stranger kisses her and his appearance is not pleasant. In most cases, this indicates an ominous vision that indicates the imminent problems that she has been exposed to or her serious illness. And when an unmarried woman sees in his dream, a dead young man kisses her and has a graceful shape and takes her with him to a distant place. This indicates his proximity to death due to a serious illness. It can be the best evidence that she has strong family ties between her and her family members. If a married woman sees in her dream a familiar person kissing her hands, this indicates the desire of the dead to pray for him. And the married woman should give them alms and ask for forgiveness often so that they may rest in their death. And the married woman in her dream saw a dead person in a dream kissing her and a stranger to her, this It indicates the bad situation between her and her husband on the way to change. It may be the best evidence that life is gradually changing from worse to better. Seeing a dead relative kissing me will be a great source of livelihood for her and an increase in the money that this family needs abundantly. It can indicate the death of anxiety, sadness, distress and the collapse of various problems. If a married woman sees that one of her parents kisses her in a dream and he is deceased, this indicates help coming to her from their side. It can be a testimony to the best in what she represents and that they stand by her to protect her from any harm that may befall her. If a married woman sees that the dead kisses her on her forehead, this dream indicates that she is a righteous woman who cares about the affairs of her family. Perhaps the best evidence for her is that she has a great position and

title: Interpretation of seeing a leech in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a leech in a dream via the website Vision roy2a.com. Seeing a leech in a dream has many meanings. Seeing it can be a good sign or an evil omen. Interpreters differed in the interpretation of seeing a leech in a dream, depending on the state and circumstances of the viewer, and whether the man or woman is single, married or pregnant, and today through the Vision website we will discuss the interpretation in detail of seeing leeches in a dream, based on the opinion of major interpreters such as Ibn Sirin. Ibn Kathir, Al-Nabulsi, and Imam Al-Sadiq, so follow us. What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a leech in a dream? Seeing a leech in a dream indicates a promising appearance full of good things for the pioneer. Seeing leeches coming out of the stomach in a dream indicates that God will bless the dreamer with a lot of goodness and sustenance. With money and children. Seeing leeches coming out of the anus in a dream announces that the dreamer will have many grandchildren. Seeing leeches coming out of the mouth in a dream shows that I am a complete liar. See also: Interpretation of seeing something coming out of the mouth in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a leech in a dream for Al-Nabulsi? Vision Leeches in a dream indicate happy news that the dreamer will hear in the coming days. Seeing leeches alone in a dream shows that he will get married soon. Seeing leeches eating on the body in a dream indicates many fears and problems in the dreamer’s life in the coming period. Seeing a black worm in a dream shows that some things Bad things happen in the dreamer’s life. See also: Interpretation of seeing oral paralysis in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a leech in a single woman’s dream? Seeing leeches alone in a dream indicates the date of her upcoming wedding. Seeing individual white worms in a dream says that she will marry a person who enjoys high and prominent esteem in society. Seeing an unmarried woman eating a stuck worm in a dream shows that she will go through a difficult period full of worries and unpleasant things. See also: Interpretation of seeing the mouth rinsing in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a stuck worm in a dream for a married woman? Seeing a married woman’s leech in the house in a dream indicates numerous disputes and crises between them. And between her husband, which will be the reason for their separation. A married woman sees a black leech emerging from her body in a dream. This indicates that she will become pregnant soon, and God knows best. A married woman sees a black leech emerging from her stomach in a dream. It indicates many worries and anxieties in her life. What is the interpretation of seeing a leech? In a dream for a pregnant woman? Seeing a pregnant leech in a dream indicates that she will undergo an easy and accessible birth process. Seeing a pregnant black worm in a dream indicates that she will face some health problems during the birth process. Seeing a pregnant white worm in a dream announces that she will give birth to a female, and God knows best. Worms In a single woman's dream, seeing individual worms in a dream shows that something happy will happen to her in the next few days. Seeing individual white worms in a dream indicates that she will be associated with a good person who has many good qualities. See also: Interpretation of seeing a kiss on the mouth

title: Interpretation of a dream about talking about fish in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about a talking fish in a dream Some people want to know the interpretation of a dream about a talking fish in a dream, and there are a large number of clues and interpretations of dreams. Interpretation of a dream about talking about fish in a dream: Anyone who dreams that a fish is talking to them may indicate good things happening to the dreamer at that time. In If there is a personal opinion that the fish was talking to him in a dream, this may indicate happy events that will come to the dreamer in that period. Seeing a fish talking in a dream may indicate the successes that the dreamer will achieve during this period. A person’s dream that a fish is talking to him may indicate On the rationality and emotion that the dreamer deals with a lot during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about washing fish in a dream: Washing and cleaning fish in a dream may indicate the death of the dreamer’s worries during this period. Seeing fish washing in water may indicate that it will be beneficial to the dreamer during this Time. A dream about cleaning and washing fish in a dream may indicate that you will obtain a lot of money, livelihood and wealth during this period. If one sees that he is washing fish, this may indicate very good news that the person receives. Interpretation of a dream about fish in the freezer in a dream Seeing fish may indicate Frozen in a dream indicates the dreamer’s desire to keep and save her money. In the case of a person’s opinion of frozen fish, this may indicate the dreams and ambitions that he seeks to achieve during those days. Dreaming of having fish in the refrigerator in a dream may indicate the dreamer’s patience and diligence at that time. Seeing fish in the freezer in a dream may indicate God’s gifts and the dreamer’s abundance during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of cutting fish in a dream If you see yourself cutting fish in a dream, this may mean that you will achieve your dreams and desires at that time. Seeing cutting fish in a dream indicates On the dreamer’s desire to achieve his goals and ambitions in those days. In the event that one believes that one is cutting a large fish, this may indicate an abundance of goodness in his life at that time. A dream of cutting fish in a dream may indicate the good luck that the dreamer had in That time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about buying raw fish in a dream If a woman sees that she is buying a fish in a dream, this may indicate her continuous effort to achieve her goals and ambitions. A dream about buying fish in a dream may indicate the dreamer’s extensive diet. In the event of his personal opinion that he is buying Fish, this may indicate the desire to accumulate money in those days. Whoever sees in his dream that he is buying fish in a dream may indicate good changes that will happen to the dreamer in the coming period, thanks to God. Interpretation of a dream about dried fish in a dream Seeing dried fish in a dream may indicate some The problems that the dreamer faces during this period. Seeing dried fish in a dream may indicate the dreamer’s desire to be patient to achieve his dreams. If a person sees dried salty fish in a dream, this may indicate some difficulty that the dreamer faces in achieving his goals.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing magic in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Magic is one of the forbidden and evil things that a person can harm another person with, so the appearance of magic in a dream is a very confusing vision for the dreamer, because he does not know whether the vision is really related to magic or has other associations and interpretations, so we will explain to you the opinion of dream interpreters about Interpretation of seeing magic in a dream in detail. Interpretation of a dream of seeing a handshake in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing magic in a dream by Imam Al-SadiqImam Al-Sadiq says that magic in a dream is not necessarily magic, but rather it can be an expression of great harm that will befall the dreamer in the coming period. Also, Magic can indicate that the dreamer has committed many prohibited or wrong actions, so he needs to re-examine himself and stop them. If the dreamer sees that he has magic and does not know how to get rid of it, this may indicate that this person will fall into some problems in the period The coming, which he may not know how to solve easily. Imam Al-Sadiq also believes that magic in a married woman’s dream indicates that she will be exposed to many difficult problems between her and her husband. Interpretation of the dream of seeing the chest in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing magic in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says If magic appears in the dream, it indicates that the dreamer believes in heresies and believes in them, so he should be careful. Magic could be one of the signs that the dreamer will fall into a major financial crisis in the near future. Whoever sees himself in a dream performing magic, is spreading heresies and illusions. And the sayings and lies, and he must stop that. As for the one who sees that he is fleeing from magic, this vision indicates that the dreamer is fleeing from the machinations and evils that are plotting against him. Interpretation of the dream of seeing jasmine in a dream. Interpretation of seeing magic in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. Ibn Shaheen confirms that magic in the dream A vision that expresses the difficulties, worries, and problems that the dreamer will face in the coming period. Magic in a dream can be a sign of debt or bankruptcy. If the dreamer is a student, then magic in his dream indicates his failure this year in his studies. Magic in a dream for a married woman who She is suffering from marital problems, indicating that these problems will lead to divorce between her and her husband. Interpretation of a dream about seeing ice in a dream for a man and a woman. Interpretation of seeing magic in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi says that magic comes from a vision that indicates that the dreamer will suffer from a serious illness or a major health problem. If the dreamer sees a familiar person performing magic in the dream, then he should beware of him for bad morals, and staying with this person could harm the dreamer. And whoever sees magic present in his house, this vision indicates the presence of strife among the members of that house. As for getting rid of magic in general In a dream, it promises the dreamer safety from the betrayal of the enemy or a way out of a crisis and a difficult problem. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a pin in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi. Interpretation of seeing magic in a dream about Al-Sa’idi. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a roe in a dream. Al-Asidi says: When the dreamer sees a person known to him performing magic, he is characterized by This sh
